comments:
** OVERVIEW **
In 2.0M2 and the latest stable build (S20051110) I am unable to run the standard SalesInvoice example report using the standalone report engine.

** STEPS TO REPRODUCE **
1) Install ReportEngine as described in documentation
2) Add oda-jdbc.jar to classpath (see bug 118341)
3) Attempt to run standard SalesInvoice.rptdesign example report
Note: I have also tried adding all jars in the pluggin sub-directories.

** EXPECTED RESULTS **
Report to run without error.

** ACTUAL RESULTS **
A NoClassDefFoundError is raised.

** OUTPUT **
29/11/2005 12:43:05 org.eclipse.birt.core.util.BirtTimer logTimeTaken
INFO: Engine startup takes 406 Milliseconds.
29/11/2005 12:43:06 org.eclipse.birt.report.model.metadata.ExtensionLoader load
SEVERE: Message:The extension point [org.eclipse.birt.report.model.encryptionHelper] is not found. Error code:EXTENSION_POINT_NOT_FOUND 
29/11/2005 12:43:06 org.eclipse.birt.report.model.metadata.StructRefPropertyType validateValue
INFO: The value of the structure property is a string
29/11/2005 12:43:07 org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.DataEngineImpl <init>
INFO: Data Engine starts up
line 1 column 1 - Warning: inserting missing 'title' element
29/11/2005 12:43:07 org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.impl.MasterPageContent initSimpleMasterPage
INFO: The property HeaderHeight is not set. Use Default 1 cm.
29/11/2005 12:43:07 org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.impl.MasterPageContent initSimpleMasterPage
INFO: The property FooterHeight is not set. Use default 1 cm.
29/11/2005 12:43:08 org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.Driver setLogConfiguration
INFO: ODA driver does not have valid trace logging defined in the plug-in .options or plugin.xml file.
29/11/2005 12:43:08 org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor execute
SEVERE: Error:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/datatools/connectivity/oda/consumer/helper/OdaDriver
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.Driver.getDriverHelper(Driver.java:113)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.DriverManager.getDriverHelper(DriverManager.java:70)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.ConnectionManager.openConnection(ConnectionManager.java:112)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.executor.DataSource.newConnection(DataSource.java:156)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.executor.DataSource.open(DataSource.java:149)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.DataSourceRuntime.openOdiDataSource(DataSourceRuntime.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery$Executor.openDataSource(PreparedQuery.java:775)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery$Executor.prepareExecution(PreparedQuery.java:529)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery$Executor.access$000(PreparedQuery.java:430)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery.doPrepare(PreparedQuery.java:207)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedDataSourceQuery.execute(PreparedDataSourceQuery.java:144)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine.execute(DteDataEngine.java:221)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportItemExecutor.openResultSet(ReportItemExecutor.java:140)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.execute(TableItemExecutor.java:141)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitTableItem(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:360)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.TableItemDesign.accept(TableItemDesign.java:72)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:162)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:122)
	at RunReport.run(RunReport.java:158)
	at RunReport.main(RunReport.java:81)
line 1 column 1 - Warning: inserting missing 'title' element
29/11/2005 12:43:08 org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.DataEngineImpl shutdown
INFO: Data engine shuts down

As per bug 118341:

It seems that the following files are missing from the Report Engine in the Runtime Build:
    - birt-oda.jar (missing)
    - oda.jar (out-dated)
    - odaconsumer-helper.jar (missing)

When I copied these over from the lib directory in the Web Viewer Example it seems to resolve the problem. 

You may need to check for other out-dated or missing libraries.

Fixed in 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 115588 ***
